name: Solar system (itch) (freadam)
description:
This is my solar system project. I have added the following planets

  1. Mercury
  2. Venus
  3. Mars
  4. Jupiter
  5. Saturn
  6. Uranus
  7. Neptune
    And added post-process bloom effect
